org.wildfly.security.auth.login

Class SecurityDomain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.auth.login.SecurityDomain

  • public final class SecurityDomain
extends Object
    A security domain. Security domains encapsulate a set of security policies.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd, Darran Lofthouse

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SecurityDomain.Builder
      A builder for creating new security domains.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SecurityDomain.Builder builder()
      Create a new security domain builder.
      ServerAuthenticationContext createNewAuthenticationContext()
      Create a new authentication context for this security domain which can be used to carry out a single authentication operation.
      List<String> getSaslServerMechanismNames(SaslServerFactory saslServerFactory)
      Get the list of SASL server mechanism names that are provided by the given factory and allowed by this configuration.
      SSLServerSocketFactory getSslServerSocketFactory()
      Get an SSL server socket factory that authenticates against this security domain.
      boolean isAnonymousAllowed()
      Determine whether anonymous authorization is allowed.
      RealmIdentity mapName(String name)
      Map the provided name to a RealmIdentity.

        Create a new security domain builder.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • createNewAuthenticationContext

        public ServerAuthenticationContext createNewAuthenticationContext()
        Create a new authentication context for this security domain which can be used to carry out a single authentication operation.
        Returns:
        the new authentication context

      • mapName

        public RealmIdentity mapName(String name)
                      throws RealmUnavailableException
        Map the provided name to a RealmIdentity.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to map
        Returns:
        the identity for the name
        Throws:
        RealmUnavailableException - if the realm is not able to perform the mapping

      • getSslServerSocketFactory

        public SSLServerSocketFactory getSslServerSocketFactory()
        Get an SSL server socket factory that authenticates against this security domain.
        Returns:
        the server socket factory

      • getSaslServerMechanismNames

        public List<String> getSaslServerMechanismNames(SaslServerFactory saslServerFactory)
        Get the list of SASL server mechanism names that are provided by the given factory and allowed by this configuration.
        Parameters:
        saslServerFactory - the SASL server factory
        Returns:
        the list of mechanism names

      • isAnonymousAllowed

        public boolean isAnonymousAllowed()
        Determine whether anonymous authorization is allowed. Note that this applies only to login authentication protocols and not transport layer security (TLS).
        Returns:
        true if anonymous logins are allowed, false if anonymous logins are disallowed
